CustomField.description: When enabled, the LLM will include a confidence score (0-100) for each tool call. This allows tracking of AI certainty and identification of uncertain actions that may need human review. The confidence score is extracted from the _confidence parameter and stored in ExecutionStep records.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enable to have the AI report its confidence level (0-100) for each action. Use this to identify uncertain actions and analyze AI decision quality over time.
CustomField.label: Track Confidence
